comment: Professor Pramod was a fantastic B2B instructor! He always made sure we understood the material, often checking if his examples made sense or if we preferred ones from industries we related to. Super thoughtful & engaging, made the class genuinely enjoyable! By far one of the nicest teachers I've had & I would absolutely recommend anyone take him!

Professor Iyer is a great teacher. He has a great personality, though he seems reserved at first. He wants to have conversations with you not just talk at you. Good sense of humor. Easy grader. Took him for MGT 7010 for MBA. I think there were 3-4 group projects (including two cases).
I thoroughly enjoyed having him for the MBA Marketing class. His engaging teaching style, deep expertise, and ability to make the material both practical and enjoyable made it a fun semester!

3 tests, 3 discussions, 4 quizzes, 13 connect assignments, and a group project. Make sure to get started on the group project early, it's not super hard, but there's a lot to do. Dr. Iyer was very responsive to emails and encouraged students to send him their projects to receive feedback before turning it in. Overall, I would take him again.
